props.lead: We're not just providing exceptional medication. We're pioneers of quality, transparency, and patient-centric treatments.
props.body: Uncompromising pharmaceutical-grade quality is not just a goal for us — it's embedded in our DNA and the standards we set for ourselves and for the industry. Our commitment goes beyond profits — we’re for doing what’s right by the plant, our patients, and the planet.

props.text: For medical professionals and licensed partners. Not intended for the public.

seo.title: About Apigen - Rooted in Tradition, Growing the Future
seo.description: Discover our century-old agricultural heritage and expertise in premium cannabis cultivation. From legacy growers to modern pioneers.

cards.title: Generations of Farming Heritage
cards.content: Our story begins generations ago, in the lush farmlands of India, where our families cultivated the land with dedication, resilience, and an unwavering commitment to quality. For over a century, we've carried forward this deep-rooted agricultural heritage.

cards.title: Pioneering Cannabis Cultivation
cards.content: As the world of cannabis evolved, so did we. In the early '90s, long before legalization, our master grower refined the craft of cannabis cultivation in the grey market, honing techniques that would later define the premium cannabis industry.

cards.title: Decades of Experience & Innovation
cards.content: Decades of hands-on experience, trial, and innovation have given us an unmatched understanding of the plant—from legacy to legal. Today, we bring together the best of both worlds: the wisdom of traditional farming and the expertise of cannabis cultivation at the highest level.

cards.title: Setting New Standards
cards.content: With a team of industry veterans, we blend corporate precision with a deep passion for the plant, pushing the boundaries of quality, innovation, and sustainability. From legacy growers to modern pioneers, we are here to set new standards in cannabis, always staying true to our roots while shaping the future.

members.name: Sunny
members.bio: Leading Apigen's vision for premium cannabis cultivation and global expansion.

members.bio: Ensuring pharmaceutical-grade quality and compliance standards.
